CustomField.description: Created By: CC Department: WFT Purpose: Determine Order of Classes
CustomField.formula:
CASE(TEXT(Class__c), "Websites for Beginners", 1,
"Mobile-Friendly Websites", 2,
"Javascript for Beginners", 3,
"React", 4,
"Intro to Angular2 (Part I of II)", 5,
"Intro to Angular2 (Part II of II)", 6, 10)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The order classes are intended to be taken starting from zero. A non standard class name is given a value of ten.
CustomField.label: Class Order
